system.description:
You have learned so much about your own magical nature that the sheer force of your knowledge can overwhelm the minds of lesser beings. You are an academic’s academic and can control your inborn magical energies in unique and powerful ways. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Intelligence or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You count as a creature of your ancestry type in addition to any other types you have.
  • You have resistance to psychic damage and advantage on saving throws to avoid suffering levels of strife (this does not prevent levels of strife you would automatically suffer, such as from recharging your Measure Twice, Cut Once feature with your Student of the Bloodline benefit).
  • Your speed-reading has improved. You can read a page of un-ciphered text in a language you know as an action.
  • You can identify creatures of your ancestry type as being that type on sight, even if they are in disguise or concealed by magic.
  • You can spend a sorcery point (no action required) to automatically succeed on a knowledge check about your ancestry type with a maximum DC of your scholar level + your sorcerer level + you Intelligence modifier + your Charisma modifier.
